Bhautik Bavadiya (AKA Yesbhautik)

Hey there! I’m Bhautik Bavadiya, helping early-stage startups and founders turn their visions into reality.

Founder & CEO of YBX Group
Building FlavorGPT

Dreaming up cool hack ideas and making them come true is where my passion lies. You can find my full projects list here.

I give consultancy services in branding, business growth, career development, technical advisory, etc…
Occasionally, I also contribute to open-source/non-profit projects & activities.

Outside of technopreneurship, I enjoy photography and traveling. Some of my photos can be found on this page. I also love movies, dramas, and music - my media consumption can be found here. I live in Ahmedabad (India), if you’re around, please reach out and let’s have some coffee or work together.
